channel.title: Need help putting forums online
channel.description: Ok i use 000webhost for now and im trying to put v bulletin or another forum type on it can someone help me if you can Skype purple-rsps it will be very appreciated and id give you a rank in my server thanks

item.title: Need help putting forums online
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:453093”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=555944.msg4070340#msg4070340 date=1344288315]
There are several guides on the web about this, I would also suggest using SMF as it’s simpler to install than vBulletin is, it’s also easier to maintain.
[/quote]

This section is for help. Not to point him away from here.

Implementation questions can be in regards to setting up a CMS like Drupal or Joomla, or setting up a forum like SMF or VisualBulletin.

If you still need help tell me. I can do it[/quote]

As is the server help board, but that gets redirected to outward sites all the time, primarily because we don’t spoonfeed people, especially when it’s something such as setting up forums boards which endless guides can be found on the web.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help putting forums online
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Ruby:

There are several guides on the web about this, I would also suggest using SMF as it’s simpler to install than vBulletin is, it’s also easier to maintain.

This section is for help. Not to point him away from here.

Implementation questions can be in regards to setting up a CMS like Drupal or Joomla, or setting up a forum like SMF or VisualBulletin.
If you still need help tell me. I can do it

Read full topic
